title: Nigel Huddleston – 2022 Comments on Standing at Football Matches
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nigel Huddleston, the Sports Minister, on 4 July 2022.
content:
Based upon what I have experienced and we have learnt through the pilot programme, safe standing is set to deliver an electric atmosphere at our football stadiums.
